input.sentences: we where walking around town and decided to follow the crowd .
we made our way to the center of town and looked around .
we hung out till night to see what goes on there .
the streets lit up and stayed very lively .
output.sentences: A crowd lined up on the street.
And people even gathered on the sidewalk.
The boat came into dock and the people loaded.
As dusk fell the boat took off into the water.
The customers enjoyed themselves with the live music.
